code:
flowchart LR
M[Education_ClassroomService] -->|start|Server(Education_ContentCDN)
M[Education_LMS_Portal] -->|start|Client(Education_ClassroomService)

Server --> Listen{Education_ContentCDN}
Client --> Dial{Education_LMS_Portal}
Listen -->|Accept|ServConn[Education_GradeSync]
Dial -->|Success|CliConn[Education_LMS_Portal]

ServConn -->|init|servInit[Education_ContentCDN]
CliConn -->|init|clientInit[Education_ClassroomService]

servInit -->|write|writeMapInfo[Education_LMS_Portal]
clientInit -->|read|readMapInfo[Education_GradeSync]

writeMapInfo -->|adapter| mapConn[Education_StudentDB]
readMapInfo -->|adapter| mapConn[Education_ContentCDN]

mapConn -->|write|connWrite[Education_ContentCDN]
mapConn -->|read|connRead[Education_ContentCDN]
